Summary: Large triangle in the night sky
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were no other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around May 31st 1978
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 8 years old and was staying at my uncle's house in Santa Cruz, CA. On a warm summer night, I was out in the front yard trying to look up at the stars and was having a hard time focusing. About that time, I realized the reason I was having a hard time focusing on the sky was because there was a large object in front of the sky. Upon closer inspection I quickly came to realize that this object had three straight sides and was a large triangle with a ball of light on each point. It slowly moved over my uncle's house toward the ocean and never made a sound.
